body.name: YEAKE Flexible Gooseneck Bamboo Vanity Makeup Mirror,360°Rotation 8" Large Frameless, Folding Portable Table Desk Mirror with Stand for Bathroom Shaving Make Up, Rectangle
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 20 mins
features: ★CONSTRUCTION - Single sided Regular rectangle small mirror without magnification. The size of the small mirror glass is about 7.6x6.3 inches. The small desk mirror consists of bamboo base, gooseneck and clear mirror surface, the mirror surface is no deformation, and restore the true beauty.

★MATERIAL - The stand mirror has a solid and durable bamboo base , natural and environmentally friendly, the outer layer Has superb paint craftsmanship. The gooseneck can be bent freely. High-quality optical glass that allows you to see every detail of your whole face so you can apply makeup flawlessly.

★360°ROTATION - Portable desktop mirror, very flexible rotating swivel gooseneck that can be easily and freely bend to get a closer distance with the portable mirror for meeting your best makeup need angle.

★VERSATILE - This portable mirror easy to install and use, you can install or remove the base in 10 SECONDS for portability. Jewelry can be placed on the bamboo base. You can place the desktop mirror on any table, such as dressing table, bathroom,office desk, etc. Bamboo products have a simple style and can be used to decorate your bedroom, living room, dormitory.

★PERFECT GIFT - Holiday, birthday, christmas, awesome gifts for your parents, sister, friends or personal use. We provide a 100% satisfaction guarantee, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We will try our best to solve your problem!

Tabletop vanity mirror can meet the needs of most people. This mirror is also suitable for men and can be used as a shaving mirror. It's also an excellent choice for Gifts of friends and family.

NATURAL BAMBOO BASE In order to maintain the natural beauty of the mirror, the color of each bamboo base would be a little different. The base can also be used as a storage tray for jewelry. 360 DEGREE ROTATION The flexible gooseneck can be easily and freely bend to get a closer distance with the mirror for meeting your best makeup need angle. DESKTOP DECORATION You can place it on any table, such as dressing table, bathroom,office desk, etc. Bamboo products have a simple style and can be used to decorate your bedroom, living room, dormitory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for value
reviews.reviewText: I used this to stand on the dresser while I'm doing my hair so it works for what I need it far. As far as sturdiness goes, it's not that sturdy, but I don't expect it to be because of what the base is made out of. And it's small

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sleek but sturdy, easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good product!
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure what to expect when I bought this, like *some* other products out here on Amazon - but I was very pleasantly surprised when it arrived!The mirror size I ordered wound up being exactly the right size that I was looking for. The flexible neck is even better than I thought it would be. It is as flexible as the product images show, which is super amazing; and because of it, it’s very easy to store on my bedside table without taking up a lot of space (like my previous mirrors).When inspecting the base, I noticed low quality with the way the hole was drilled into it, and how the neck is attached to the base itself - which is disappointing. I feel like the product would be MUCH better if the manufacturer took the extra time & effort to make this product more durable by properly attaching the parts.BUT, for $15.99, I’m pretty happy with this purchase!!! Definitely recommended if you’re looking for something affordable, and you aren’t expecting the absolute best, but pretty decent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for desk or vanity. Good quality and size. Easily adjustable. I am very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice mirror good price. Description is accurate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not receive it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful mirror but not very sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is so beautiful and looks amazing on my shelf, however, after getting it, I realized that it's not very practical. Yes, it is a mirror and it does get the job done, however it isn't stable. The wire part of the mirror connecting it to the wooden stand is a screw in wire (they aren't actually built connected). Thus, from time to time, it unscrews itself (because I move it around a lot) and the mirror falls apart. In addition, if you aren't careful, based on how you may bend the mirror/wire, it can very easily fall over. Despite falling over so many times, it hasn't broken or cracked. However, it is a huge pain. So although it looks nice, I wouldn't really recommend this mirror to anyone, unless you plan to leave it in exactly one place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use it for my craft shows. Has a sleek modern look. Well made. It’s not huge but it’s perfect size.
I love the size of the mirror makes it easy to use when putting earrings in my ears

reviews.reviewTitle: Minimalistic clean lines. Not telescoping but flexible.
reviews.reviewText: Happy it arrived unbroken. Quick delivery. Nice match for bamboo tray and brushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Mirror looks good quality so easy to assemble very happy with service I received 😁👍
A lot smaller than I imagined 😅 but it’s super cute!
Not a bad mirror, but it falls over easily since the base is very light.
